location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 58 of 1856 from Henry Bartle Edward Frere, Commissioner in Sind, General Department to James Felix Jones, Acting Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing an abstract of correspondence relating to an extension of telegraphic communications from the Punjab to Kurrachee [KarƒÅchi]. The abstract outlines the administrative process that the proposal has gone through, and the benefits of an extension. It further contains another proposal to link this extension with a line through the Persian Gulf to Constantinople, and includes some discussion of the proposed route.
